t: 1 Chronicles 8
The Family Tree of King Saul of Benjamin
Now*p Benjamin begot Bela his firstborn, Ashbel the second, Aharah the third,
Nohah the fourth, and Rapha the fifth.
The sons of Bela were*i Addar, Gera, Abihud,
Abishua, Naaman, Ahoah,
Gera, Shephuphan, and Huram.
These*p are*i the sons of Ehud, who were the heads of the fathers’ houses*i of the inhabitants of Geba, and who forced them to move to Manahath:
Naaman, Ahijah, and Gera who forced them to move. He begot Uzza and Ahihud.
Also*p Shaharaim had children in the country of Moab, after he had sent away Hushim and Baara his wives.
By Hodesh his wife he begot Jobab, Zibia, Mesha, Malcam,
Jeuz, Sachiah, and Mirmah. These were*i his sons, heads of their fathers’ houses.*i
And*p by Hushim he begot Abitub and Elpaal.
The sons of Elpaal were*i Eber, Misham, and Shemed, who built Ono and Lod with its towns;
and Beriah and Shema, who were*i heads of their fathers’ houses*i of the inhabitants of Aijalon, who drove out the inhabitants of Gath.
Ahio, Shashak, Jeremoth,
Zebadiah, Arad, Eder,
Michael, Ispah, and Joha were*i the sons of Beriah.
Zebadiah, Meshullam, Hizki, Heber,
Ishmerai, Jizliah, and Jobab were*i the sons of Elpaal.
Jakim, Zichri, Zabdi,
Elienai, Zillethai, Eliel,
Adaiah, Beraiah, and Shimrath were*i the sons of Shimei.
Ishpan, Eber, Eliel,
Abdon, Zichri, Hanan,
Hananiah, Elam, Antothijah,
Iphdeiah, and Penuel were*i the sons of Shashak.
Shamsherai, Shehariah, Athaliah,
Jaareshiah, Elijah, and Zichri were*i the sons of Jeroham.
These*p were*i heads of the fathers’ houses*i by their generations, chief men. These dwelt in Jerusalem.
Now*p the father of Gibeon, whose wife’s name was*i Maacah, dwelt at Gibeon.
And his firstborn son was*i Abdon, then Zur, Kish, Baal, Nadab,
Gedor, Ahio, Zecher,
and Mikloth, who*i begot Shimeah. They also dwelt alongside their relatives in Jerusalem, with their brethren.
Ner begot Kish, Kish begot Saul, and Saul begot Jonathan, Malchishua, Abinadab, and Esh-Baal.
The son of Jonathan was*i Merib-Baal, and Merib-Baal begot Micah.
The sons of Micah were*i Pithon, Melech, Tarea, and Ahaz.
And Ahaz begot Jehoaddah; Jehoaddah begot Alemeth, Azmaveth, and Zimri; and Zimri begot Moza.
Moza begot Binea, Raphah his son, Eleasah his son, and*i Azel his son.
Azel*p had six sons whose names were*i these: Azrikam, Bocheru, Ishmael, Sheariah, Obadiah, and Hanan. All these were*i the sons of Azel.
And the sons of Eshek his brother were*i Ulam his firstborn, Jeush the second, and Eliphelet the third.
The*p sons of Ulam were mighty men of valor—archers. They*i had many sons and grandsons, one hundred and fifty in*i all.*i These were*i all sons of Benjamin.
